TextLibrary.Text: I think Lydia's plan to visit the Quesadan Priests is wise. They are nearby, and their knowledge of matters both arcane and scientific is second only to that found in the Luminary Archive.
I think Lydia's plan to visit the Quesadan Priests is wise. They are nearby, and their knowledge of matters both arcane and scientific is second only to that found in the Luminary Archive.
Okay. We'll head through Cepheus and on to Quesada.
Okay. We'll head through Cepheus and on to Quesada.
